content.text: A Touch of Egyptian Tradition • Silky Smooth • Luxuriously Creamy • Bursting with Authentic Flavour • Made with the Finest Ingredients

content.title: Our Story
content.subtitle: Where Tradition Meets Innovation
content.description1: Founded with a passion for authentic dairy, High Laban began as a small family initiative to bring pure, additive-free Laban to our community.
content.description2: Today, we continue that legacy by combining traditional methods with modern quality standards, ensuring every bottle delivers the fresh, crisp taste you love.
content.subdescription: From our farm to your table, we promise uncompromised quality and a taste that brings people together.

content.title: Our Locations
content.subtitle: Find your nearest HighLaban and experience the taste of Egypt.
